妷字的基本解释

妷
zhí
古同“侄”：“亲交既许来，子妷亦可以。”

妷
yì
放荡：“有妷者女，颜如舜英。

妷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》直一切，入質，澄。］
［《廣韻》徒結切，入屑，定。］
亦作“妷1”。同“侄1”。
(1)古时女子称兄弟的子女为侄。
(2)晋以后男子始称兄弟之子为侄。
(3)泛称同辈男性亲友的子女。如某某贤侄。亦用以对父辈尊长自称侄。如世侄、姻侄等。

妷字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妷； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页257第25
【集韻】同姪。　又弋質切，音逸。【博雅】劮婸也劮。同妷。一曰淫妷也。

Basic explanation of words
Yum
zhí
Gu Tong's "nephew": "If you have a personal relationship, you can also come."
Yum
yì
Debauchery: "A woman who has a woman, Yan Rushunying.
Yum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
["Guangyun" straightens everything, enters the quality, and clarifies. ]
["Guangyun" only knots, cuts, and sets. ]
Also known as "妷1". Same as "nephew 1".
(1) In ancient times, a woman called her brother's children a nephew.
(2) After the Jin Dynasty, men began to call their brother's son a nephew.
(3) Generally referred to as children of male relatives and friends of the same generation. Such as XX virtuous nephew. It is also used to call himself a nephew to the elders of the parents. Such as nephews, nephews in-laws, etc.
Yum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妷; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 257 No. 25
【Ji Yun】The same maiden.　The quality is cut again, and the sound is easy. [Bo Ya] Shun and Shun Ye are also Shun. Same woman. One said that the prostitute is also.
